case.name: Wardrobe Malfunction
case.description: Erufuda splits her pants while removing her socks.

case.name: Tight Jacket Off
case.description: Erufuda is forced to reveal that her jacket was deceptively tight.

markers.marker: Erufuda is jealous of an athletic player's abs.
Erufuda thanks Akko for fixing her pants.
Erufuda is offended by Akko's dislike of potatoes.
Erufuda asks Akko to order her some more fries.
Erufuda is worried about the prospect of magic fries.
Erufuda explains the rules keeping her trapped in the human world.
Erufuda thinks Akko would like potatoes if they were fried.
Erufuda doesn't know how to shapeshift.
Erufuda is offended by Akko's insinuation.
Erufuda asks an American if every meal comes with fries.
Erufuda comments that elves tend to appeal to otherwise heterosexual people.
Erufuda mentions that she's bisexual.
Erufuda is furious that someone could have abs and big boobs.
Erufuda touts the supriority of bows over guns to Revy.
Erufuda offers to help an opponent with their diet.
Erufuda asks what kind of diet Emi follows, hoping to hear fries.
Erufuda mocks Emi for wagering a lap.
Erufuda accepts Emi's challenge.
Erufuda tells Emi that she used to be a runner back home.
Erufuda speculates that she could eat more fries if she worked out like Emi.
Erufuda flirts with an athletic female opponent.
Erufuda assumes French people are obsessed with fries.
Erufuda is intrigued by Marinette's description of French cuisine.
Erufuda tells the player that she won't count her fries as an item.
Erufuda taunts another chubby character about their clothes getting tight.
Erufuda suggests Jura might find luck cooking for men.
Erufuda teases Jura for showing up half-naked.
Erufuda thinks Kyu is a dark elf because of her clothing dissipation.
Erufuda thinks Leggy is from another world.
Erufuda panics at the site of Leggy's shaving.
Erufuda hypocritically accuses Leggy of turning around for attention.
Erufuda thinks Emi's removable legs are cheating.
Erufuda can eat more than fries...
Erufuda taunts Marinette for being a skinny baker's daughter.
Erufuda accuses Marinette of using dark elf clothing magic.
Erufuda asks Marinette to fix her pants.
Erufuda doesn't know what a Kwami is.
Erufuda is jealous of Meia's butt.
Erufuda is glad to see a confident opponent.
Erufuda compliments an opponent's bodysuit.
Erufuda compliments an unshaved opponent.
Erufuda compliments a shaved opponent.
Erufuda asks Revy not to smoke.
Erufuda is surpirsed by Pinkie's choice to use a balloon.
Erufuda thinks Pinka is a demon.
Erufuda asks Pinkie why she's pink.
Erufuda rejects Pinkie's cupcakes, saying she's on a diet.
Erufuda is glad to see Pinkie's balloon popping wasn't too painful.
Erufuda is shocked by Pinka's arrival.
Erufuda is shocked when Pinkie's balloon pops.
Erufuda doesn't like Rin saying she's suffering from the curse of tight clothes.
Erufuda asks Rin if she does figure drawing, with an eye toward modeling for her.
Erufuda agrees to give Rin a fry.
Erufuda explains that the reason her jacket was uncomfortable was because Human shrunk it in the wash.
Erufuda finally understands.
Erufuda asks Sei for a soda.
Erufuda encourages a shy opponent.
Erufuda accuses an athletic opponent of being stuipd for losing.
Erufuda offers to spar with another warrior.
Erufuda accuses a superhero of being a coward for removing an accessory.
Erufuda asks Trainer if she can lose some flab with Wii Fit.
Erufuda questions Trainer about her current regime.
Erufuda wants to know what kind of diet Trainer follows.
Erufuda taunts Trainer, saying she should set a goal to get better at poker.
Erufuda boasts that she needs more bra support than Trainer.
Erufuda considers Trainer's standing masturbation to be showing off.
Erufuda thinks Trainer might not lose so much if she trained herself more.
Erufuda comments on the fact that you can wear workout clothes without working out.
Erufuda tells Trainer that she likes yoga pants for their stretchiness.
Erufuda wonders how an athletic opponent finds the time to workout.
Erufuda tells Zone-tan that she's naturally hairless.
Erufuda warns Zone-tan about human nudity rules.
